backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features related to removing music functionality from ProposeDayPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH color theme with global styles for background, text, and reduced-motion support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ProposeDayPage as the app's main component.
frontend/src/components/FinalReveal.tsx: Displays a reveal button that shows a final romantic message once clicked.
frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.t: Main proposal page with hero section, love letter content, animations, and the final reveal component.
Renders decorative roses and falling petals with scroll reveal and reduced-motion alternatives.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper component applying scroll-reveal animations to its children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor, updating on identity changes and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and persistent identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future query hooks with no functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: A React hook that uses IntersectionObserver to mark an element visible on scroll, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with a custom rose-themed color palette, typography, motion settings, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Propose Day siteâ€™s goals, aesthetic direction, features, and architectural notes.
